name: Currency Functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to be able to change the currency
  So that I can view prices in my preferred currency

elements.name: Filter by Minimum Price

steps.name: User is on the product page
User filters with minimum price "2000"
Products should be filtered to have prices greater than or equal to "2000"

elements.name: Filter by Category

steps.name: User is on the product page
User filters by category "Computers"
Products should be filtered by category "Computers"

elements.name: Filter by Availability

steps.name: User is on the product page
User filters by "Exclude Stock Out"
Out of stock product should not be listed

elements.name: Filter by Offers

steps.name: User is on the product page
User filters by offer "20% or More"
Products that are not in the offer category should not be listed

elements.name: Combine Multiple Filters

steps.name: User is on the product page
User applies category "Computers", minimum price "2000", and offer "20% or More"
Products should be filtered by all specified criteria

elements.name: Viewing product details for a valid product

steps.name: I navigate to the product detail page for product "12345"
I should see the product title "Dell Inspiron 15"
I should see a product description that is not empty
I should see a price displayed in "LKR"
I should see a high-quality main product image

elements.name: Viewing product details for an out-of-stock product

steps.name: I navigate to the product detail page for product "67890"
I should see the product title "Samsung Galaxy S21"
I should see a message indicating "Out of Stock"
the "Add to Cart" button should be "disabled"

elements.name: Viewing product details for a non-existent product

steps.name: I navigate to the product detail page for product "00000"
I should see a message indicating "Product not found"

elements.name: Verifying the image gallery for a product

steps.name: I navigate to the product detail page for product "13579"
I should see a high-quality main product image
I should be able to navigate through the image gallery
I should see the zoom feature working on the product image

elements.name: Verifying add-to-cart functionality for an available product

steps.name: I navigate to the product detail page for product "24680"
I should see the product title "Sony WH-1000XM4"
the "Add to Cart" button should be "enabled"

elements.name: Searching for a single product

steps.name: I open the HomePage
I search for "laptop"
I should see search results related to "laptop"

elements.name: Searching for a product with multiple keywords

steps.name: I open the HomePage
I search for "dell laptop"
I should see search results related to "dell"

elements.name: Searching for a product with special characters

steps.name: I open the HomePage
I search for "msi modern 15 B13M"
I should see search results related to "msi modern 15 B13M"

elements.name: Searching for a non-existent product

steps.name: I open the HomePage
I search for "xyz123nonexistentproduct"
I should see a message indicating no search results were found

elements.name: Searching for only special Characters

steps.name: I open the HomePage
I search for "!@#%^&*"
